MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L6 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Parton Street, Shiel Road and surrounding areas. We have restored supplies to a number of properties. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a complex underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:16AM on1st February 2021
